title: Parents support policies to limit teens' access to indoor tanning

title_detail.value: Parents support policies to limit teens' access to indoor tanning

summary: Almost two-thirds (65 percent) of parents of adolescents agreed with policies to ban indoor tanning for youth under age 18, a study has found. About one-quarter of parents had no opinion (23 percent), and only 12 percent disagreed. Support for an indoor tanning ban was high across racial/ethnic groups and geographic regions of the US.
